message.entry: Inputs {0} and {1} have incompatible sizes. If input {0} is an N-by-1 quaternion array, then input {1} must have 1 or N rows. If input {0} is a 3-by-3-by-N array of rotation matrices, then input {1} must have 1 or N rows.
Input {1} to {0} must be an N-by-1 array of quaternions or a 3-by-3-by-N array of rotation matrices.
